text: Can I have HUB ID 2506632 enabled for HUBDB?
Hey Remington. It looks like that customer will need the full Website Add-on to receive HubDB.

All — HubDB will be released to all customers with the full Website add-on ($300 version) this Wednesday afternoon. At that time you’ll be able to find a link to HubDB from the Website Dashboard in the lower-left hand nav under “More tools”.
Sorry, to be clear … HubDB will only be available to customers with the Website add-on, and not Website Starter. It looks like that customer has Website Starter.
To be clear... it's a free add-on for the Website add-on, right?
Yes, it’s included with the Website Add-on.

Just so everyone is on the same page:

- Website Add-on ($300/mo): HubDB is included at no additional cost
- Website Starter ($100/mo): HubDB is not included and customers will need the Website Add-on to obtain HubDB
